title: Damn son I actually got it.....
body:
[](http://[url=http://imgur.com/bfzW4b1][img]http://i.imgur.com/bfzW4b1.png[/img][/url])

Damn the feeling when you are about to quit league this season then Riot pulls off a B.S move like this to keep me back.....

Now got Coperate Mundo, Dragon Trainer Tristana and now Elementalist lux....from loots...

replies.body: Cool. then theres me, getting champions

This post reminded me that I had another key. I went to open a chest..... And I got................................................ A champion shard. I own all champions...

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

> [{quoted}](name=I mute all of U,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KdTwAo4w,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-12-03T15:49:02.443+0000)
>
> This post reminded me that I had another key. I went to open a chest..... And I got................................................ A champion shard. I own all champions...
> 
> {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

But do you need blue essence or a champ shard to get gud and upgrade to tier 6 or 7 ;p?
Don't rub it in! :(
I'm a Syndra main and got snow day syndra. Was a happy day.

> [{quoted}](name=Enlegacy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KdTwAo4w,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-12-03T21:49:21.463+0000)
>
> I'm a Syndra main and got snow day syndra. Was a happy day.

Omg I'm a Sona main and got Silent Night on a reroll :') Now I just need Muse! 

also this dude's chest luck is just too good, damn.
Would be a shame if you pretty much never played Lux :(
Congrats man! I wish I could get luck like that, I really want to get elementalist Lux but I don't have enough money.
FCUK! I mean... congratulations :)
Nice! Does it come with the loading border and icons o.o?

> [{quoted}](name=Lucifir,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KdTwAo4w,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-03T05:18:25.261+0000)
>
> Nice! Does it come with the loading border and icons o.o?

.....Holy fk forgot about that part LMAO.
So did it??

> [{quoted}](name=Lucifir,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KdTwAo4w,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-03T05:34:28.383+0000)
>
> So did it??

I don't know.... I don't activate or ever touch chest unless just to unlock it.... XP
It does, If it didn't that would be locked content. FOREVER. I got the ezreal skin and also got the border + icon.
it does. those skins come with everything they normally do
I got bloodmoon kennen and project ashe. I don't own kennen and I need more essence to unlock project ashe.

I wish I got cool loot skins.
I have a ton of dust.
15 orange essence away from unmasked kayle, and i keep getting champ shards that i already own...
meanwhile someone posted the same thing the day the skin got released and it got -3 votes

I actually got both ultimate skins from {{champion:81}}  and {{champion:77}}  in one box (it was during the project event, you got 2 skins in one box). I cried afterwards.

Still have both in my hextech inventory, they need so many orange essences to unlock (5900)
Yeah just got star guardian jinx on mine... I don't own jinx :-:

Got DJ Sona before .... only thing was, I already had the skin.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

Least I got a lot of gold essence from it, so not a waste lol.
Congrats on your shard by the way!
I got elementalist lux and spirit guard udyr from hextech XD
I got Pulsefire Ez last weekend from combining 3 skins was pretty stoked
Now you just gotta spent another 15$ to get the essence to make it all real.
Till now i have only gotten Tundra Fizz, Ironscale Shyvana and muay thai lee sin
Im jealous.
I always just get garbage like marauder warwick and commando garen :(

wtf 
crazy
congrats
